Values.3: Riot shield (1 ARMOR, equip as weapon)
Values.4: Heavy riot shield (2 ARMOR, equip as weapon)

Values.14: Large blade (combat knife, axe, etc) - 1D6 DAMAGE
Values.15: Light hand (wraps, thick gloves, etc) - 3 DAMAGE
Values.21: Small ranged (slingshot, BB gun, etc) - 3 DAMAGE

11.Name: ACCURATE
11.Effect: Scoped, sighted, or well-balanced; this weapon grants one automatic success when attacking per mission.

12.Name: ANTI-MATERIEL
12.Effect: Deals double DAMAGE to vehicles and structures; cumbersome to carry around.

13.Name: ALT-FIRE
13.Effect: This weapon has a secondary component or form which also deals damage, (e.g. bayonet, launcher attachment, sword that becomes a whip).

14.Name: ARMOR-PIERCING
14.Effect: Attacks with this weapon ignore ARMOR bonuses granted by physical means.

15.Name: BANE
15.Effect: Forged from (or fires) a magically useful material of your choice (silver, salt, etc.) Deals double DAMAGE to those affected.

16.Name: COLLAPSIBLE
16.Effect: Easily concealed, no matter the size; will never be detected during pat-downs.

21.Name: CURSED
21.Effect: Requires powerful magic to remove once equipped. The wielder may permanently spend 1D6 MAX HP to guarantee a successful attack.

22.Name: CUSTOMIZED
22.Effect: Deals an additional 1 DAMAGE and has a weapon skin (`/matrix gear skin`); coveted by enemies.

23.Name: DUMMY
23.Effect: Appears to be a weapon, but is actually another mundane item of your choice (e.g. gun lighter, fake sword with a hidden compartment).

24.Name: ELECTRIFIED
24.Effect: Deals double DAMAGE to robots and other complex machines. Shorts out running electronics and briefly electrifies bodies of water.

25.Name: EXPERIMENTAL
25.Effect: When each mission begins, roll D66 on this table for the weapon's effect (if you get EXPERIMENTAL, create a new one with the ref).

26.Name: FLASHY
26.Effect: If you describe a unique and bombastic attack with this weapon, you can roll +CREATIVE to hit.

31.Name: GRIP
31.Effect: Custom materials and ergonomic design; the referee can never state that you drop this weapon.

32.Name: HEAVY
32.Effect: This thing is too big to be called a weapon. Once per mission, take +3 on a FORCEFUL roll that involves this weapon.

33.Name: HUD
33.Effect: Scans hostiles. When you kill something new, the referee will tell you a useful fact about it.

34.Name: ICE
34.Effect: Makes surfaces slick and deals double DAMAGE to anything that requires warmth to function.

35.Name: INCENDIARY
35.Effect: When damage is dealt, this weapon also deals 2 DAMAGE to anything within fire-spreading range. Deals double DAMAGE to plants.

36.Name: INDESTRUCTIBLE
36.Effect: Impervious to everything; can withstand any amount of pressure or corrosion.

41.Name: LIGHT
41.Effect: Weighs almost nothing. Grants +1 on REFLEXIVE rolls that involve this weapon.

42.Name: LOUD
42.Effect: Attacks with this weapon draw the undivided attention of enemies within earshot (and instantly reveal your position).

43.Name: LUCKY
43.Effect: Rolling an ultra success while attacking with this weapon grants the user one WAR DIE.

44.Name: MEDICAL
44.Effect: Once per mission, you may use this weapon to deal negative DAMAGE, healing the target.

45.Name: MESSY
45.Effect: Enemies explode into gore/goo/scrap etc. on ultra successes (in addition to the usual bonus). No identifiers will remainâ€”not even teeth.

46.Name: MENACING
46.Effect: Enemies who see a comrade slain by this weapon have a 1-in-1D6 chance to flee.

51.Name: NON-LETHAL
51.Effect: Does not deal DAMAGE; has a 3-in-1D6 chance to knock unconscious on a success.

52.Name: POISONED
52.Effect: When you would roll for damage for this weapon, wait and mark your target as poisoned instead. Next time they're hurt, roll your DAMAGE and add it to the total amount they take.

53.Name: PROTOTYPE
53.Effect: Wielding this next-generation weapon grants +1 TACTICAL; roll +TAC to attack with it.

54.Name: QUICK-DRAW
54.Effect: Attacks that target enemies drawing their weapons will always succeed.

55.Name: REMOTE
55.Effect: Projectiles (or the weapon itself) can be remotely steered through chutes and around walls.

56.Name: RITUAL
56.Effect: Shatters to protect you from death once, negating lethal damage. Disintegrates afterward.

61.Name: SAPIENT
61.Effect: Communicates with its wielder by thought; roll 1D6 for disposition: bloodthirsty, caring, craven, excitable, morose, stoic.

62.Name: SHREDDER
62.Effect: Deals double DAMAGE to exposed flesh. On critical hits, decreases the target's ARMOR by 1.

63.Name: STUN
63.Effect: Those damaged by this weapon cannot move or act until their current HP changes.

64.Name: TRANQUILIZER
64.Effect: As NON-LETHAL, but chance is increased to 5-in-1D6 if a vulnerable area is specifically targeted (e.g. head, neck, exposed membrane, etc.)

65.Name: UNSTABLE
65.Effect: Can be set to overload to deal triple DAMAGE once; explodes for 3D6 damage to everyone nearby seconds later.

66.Name: VALUABLE
66.Effect: Utterly unique in history or make. Can be used as a bargaining chip in almost any situation.
